metadata.title: CVE-2023-49208 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: scheme/webauthn.c in Glewlwyd SSO server before 2.7.6 has a possible bufferoverflow during FIDO2 credentials validation in webauthn registration.

criterions.comment: glewlwyd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
